title: Ep. 67 - Why Oil Prices Could Jump to $120
itunes:title: Why Oil Prices Could Jump to $120
description: Andrew Horowitz from The Disciplined Investor tells us the best countries to invest in right now.  He also talks with Frank about the impact of higher oil prices, why you should buy stocks on a pullback, and whether stocks are cheap at current levels.
